title: Where can i download Ornn's login music?
body: I like it, something good enough to add to my collection.

replies.body:
It's not what you asked for, but here is a playlist of songs I used to write Ornn's stories and VO to: 

* "Shambhalla" by Steven Halpern
* "Wake the World" by the Beach Boys
* "Hawaiian War Chant" by Martin Denny
* "Apeman" by the Kinks
* "Maxwell's Silver Hammer" by the Beatles
* "Tiki God" by the Presidents of the United States of America
* "Ink" by Tusks
* "Sea of Oms" by Morley
* "Doom and Gloom" (Jeff Bhasker Mix) by the Rolling Stones
* "Highway to Hell" by ACDC
* "Immigrant Song" by Led Zeppelin
* "Hammer to Fall" by Queen
* "Flash" by Queen
* "One of These Days" (Live Version) by Pink Floyd
* "All I Need" by Radiohead
* "Misty Mountains" from the Hobbit
* "Rise" by Hans Zimmer
* "Mash the Pigeon" by Magic Drum Orchestra
* "Floki Appears to Kill Athelstan" by Trevor Morris
* "King Kong" by James Newton Howard
* "Kill Your Heroes" by AWOLnation
* "When the Levee Breaks" by Led Zeppelin

It looks like the login music is now on LoL's Soundcloud, however I can only check on my phone at the moment and can't tell if it's downloadable or not.

https://www.soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends

https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/the-path-to-hearth-home

Click the "More" button beneath the track, then "Download."
